title: help
body: ayye can anybody help me log into league of legends  cuz it just sits their at the loading screen scanning files for hours and days and (like teemo waiting in a bush for a kill{{champion:17}})   its not letting me do anything ive tried repairing and saving logs but nothing is working,any tips on what i should do?

replies.body:
When your patching process is stuck at scanning files for this amount of time, it's usually caused by League not having system permissions. Since League interacts with a lot of files outside of the League folder, it's important that your Operating System grants it the access it needs. I recommend working through our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to resolve this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
i have spent money on rp points but it says the region for rp is incorrect... what do i do?
Since your issue falls under billing, which deals with sensitive info, I recommend you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our specialists can assist you.
